text: The Great Waldo Pepper is a 1975 American adventure drama movie directed by George Roy Hill and starring Robert Redford, Bo Svenson, Bo Brundin, Susan Sarandon, Geoffrey Lewis, Scott Newman, Margot Kidder. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 drama movies Category:1975 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by George Roy Hill Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Great Waldo Pepper
